title: Wondershare PDFelement 6.1.2.2385 + patch - Crackingpatching
description:
Description: 
Wondershare PDFelement 6.1.2.2385 + Portable OCR 6.1.0.2326 - [CrackingPatching] 
According to the developers, Wondershare PDFelement is the best program for general editing of PDF documents, a tool from the all-in-one series. The concept of editing includes support for changing text and font. Support for OCR technology (optical character recognition) is implemented, there is a mode of converting the document into various other formats, there is support for adding your pictures to the document, you can number the pages for fast moving in the future. 
Wondershare PDFelement can add the forms you need to the pages of the document, there is a mode that allows you to merge several documents into one, certainly not without the ability to add your annotations. If desired, the document can be protected with a password after your editing. A rare feature, but still in Wondershare PDFelement is also there, a digital signature that you can put on your document. 
The program looks good, I liked the interface, in general it is already standard, all applications try to fit it under Windows 8/10, it's a pity there is no Russian support, everything else pleases. 

Developer: Wondershare 
License: ShareWare 
Language: English 
Size: 112.67 & amp; 43.19 & amp; 421.69 MB 
OS: Windows 

How to Install: 
1). Instructions are included in ReadMe.txt if needed. 
2). Thats all, Done & enjoy
